comments.content: lol, adding your blood grp on fb helps to find a person with required blood group in your area easily. Just don't make fun of a really good feature.

This is what happens when jio provides free internet to these people, dude there is a cause behind it, they notify you if someone needs the blood matching your group, so before knowing full story please remove this shit , at least don't make fun of every cause ,

This is actually a dB creation drive for every blood-group type. So yeah, its not showoff. Once you tell fb what your bg is, it saves that data and will then contact you if someone in your area needs your blood type. Also, this post comes as a by product of that activity. Not bad eh?

Honestly, everyone should do this. Unless you're a kid scared of needles or battling a terminal disease like HIV. Instead of slandering this act, people with wider reach like you should support the move. Dfuq!

description: "Mr. Vadra, remember that journalist who broke the story of your business dealings with DLF? Well, she apparently found that Amit Shah's son made a suspicious amount of money after BJP came into power."    "Are you serious?"    "Yes, I'm serious. Remember how the BJP distributed DVDs elaborating on your scam based on Rohini Singh's investigative articles? Now the same people who used her investigation ...  on you as final proof of Congress's corruption are saying that she can't be trusted as apparently she runs fake news."    "Are you serious?"    "Yes, I'm serious you dumb bastard. The same people who found your sudden increase in wealth suspicious, are now saying that 'every new business starts with nil turnover on day one, expands later. What is wrong with legitimate expansion of business?". These people are wilfullly ignoring the fact that all this expansion took place in one year and the firm was folded up a month before demonetisation."    "Are you serious?"    "Yes, bhootni ke, I'm fucking serious. The same people who have done nothing to arrest you over the last three years are now bringing you up again because they have nothing else to say to their supporters."    "Are you serious?"    "Bhai tere dimaag mein kuch chemical locha hai kya? Expired protein shake pi liya hai kya tu ne? I'M SERIOUS you haraami. Do you have anything to say to BJP and their supporters on this issue?"    "Vikas gando thayo chhe."   See More Vishno Sirohi Prerna Tandon Luthra Subhasattwa Das Rimi Sen Das Dhrubaa De Mukherjee Subhadra Chatterjee Saunak Ghosh Abid Murshed Merlin Vincent
